issues.title: [BUG] Fix Services Page 404 Error
issues.body:
## Problem

The Services page returns a 404 error despite being directly linked from the homepage CTA "Discover Our Services". This is a critical conversion blocker.

## Impact

- **CRITICAL** - Breaks primary conversion path
- Blocks potential clients from learning about services
- Undermines credibility
- Lost lead generation

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] /services URL returns 200 status
- [ ] Page displays service offerings clearly
- [ ] Homepage CTA link works
- [ ] Navigation menu link works
- [ ] Services descriptive and compelling
- [ ] Mobile responsive design
- [ ] SEO optimized

issues.title: [BUG] Add Alt Text to All Images
issues.body:
## Problem

Multiple images lack descriptive alt text. WCAG 2.1 AA compliance violation.

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Accessibility compliance violation
- Screen reader users cannot access visual content
- Search engines cannot index images
- SEO impact

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All images have descriptive alt text
- [ ] Alt text keyword-optimized where appropriate
- [ ] Profile/headshots labeled with context
- [ ] Project images describe content/purpose
- [ ] Decorative images have empty alt=""
- [ ] Tested with screen readers
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verified

issues.title: [BUG] Fix Color Contrast for WCAG Compliance
issues.body:
## Problem

Color contrast (#404040 text on #f9f9f9 background) does not meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards (requires 4.5:1, currently 3.2:1).

## Impact

- **HIGH** - Accessibility failure
- Non-compliance with WCAG 2.1 AA
- Poor readability for low vision users

## Recommended Solution

Darken text to #1a1a1a (achieves 7.3:1 ratio).

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All body text meets 4.5:1 contrast ratio
- [ ] Large text meets 3:1 ratio
- [ ] Validation using WAVE or axe DevTools
- [ ] No design regression
- [ ] All pages tested and passing

issues.title: [UX] Adjust Newsletter Popup Timing
issues.body:
## Problem

Newsletter popup auto-opens after 1 second, creating poor UX and frustrating visitors before they can engage with content.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Negative UX, potential bounce rate increase
- Interrupts user intent
- Accessibility issue

## Recommended Solutions

- Delayed trigger: 10-15 seconds (vs 1 second)
- Scroll-based: 30-50% down page
- Exit-intent: When leaving
- Hybrid approach (best)

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Popup no longer auto-opens at 1 second
- [ ] Chosen timing strategy implemented
- [ ] Easy close mechanism
- [ ] Dismissal remembered
- [ ] Mobile experience improved
- [ ] Accessibility compliance verified

issues.title: [CONTENT] Add Pricing Information to Services

issues.title: [A11Y] Add ARIA Labels to Icon Buttons
issues.body:
## Problem

Social media icon buttons lack aria-labels for screen readers. Users cannot understand button purpose.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Accessibility barrier
- WCAG 2.1 AA violation
- Screen reader users cannot navigate social links

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All icon buttons have descriptive aria-labels
- [ ] Labels concise and meaningful
- [ ] Tested with screen readers
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Focus indicators visible
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verified

issues.title: [A11Y] Fix Search Field Accessibility
issues.body:
## Problem

Search functionality lacks visible labels and proper aria-labels. Not accessible to screen reader users.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Significant barrier for screen reader users
- WCAG 2.1 AA violation
- Cannot understand search field purpose

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Search input has descriptive aria-label
- [ ] Visible label text associated
- [ ] Search button has clear aria-label
- [ ] Form announced correctly
- [ ] Keyboard navigation works
- [ ] Tested with screen readers
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verified

issues.title: [UX] Add Hover States to CTA Buttons
issues.body:
## Problem

CTA buttons lack visible hover states, making them feel unresponsive.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Poor UX and perceived responsiveness
- Users uncertain if buttons are interactive
- Reduced click-through rates
- Lower conversion

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] All primary CTA buttons have :hover state
- [ ] Hover state visually distinct
- [ ] Transition smooth (0.2-0.3s)
- [ ] :focus state for keyboard users
- [ ] :active state for press feedback
- [ ] Tested on desktop browsers
- [ ] Mobile touch feedback
- [ ] Color contrast maintained

issues.title: [UX] Create Membership Benefits Comparison Matrix
issues.body:
## Problem

Membership page lacks clear visual comparison of benefits and tiers. Users cannot easily understand tier differences.

## Impact

- **MEDIUM** - Reduced membership conversion
- Confusion about tier differences
- Benefits undervalued

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Comparison matrix displays all tiers side-by-side
- [ ] Clear column headers for each tier
- [ ] Cells show included vs excluded features
- [ ] Pricing clearly displayed
- [ ] CTA button for each tier
- [ ] Recommended tier highlighted
- [ ] Mobile responsive (vertical on small screens)
- [ ] WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
